alert.note: Alert for Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Eastern Franklin; Eastern Rutland; Western Rutland (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 17 at 3:12PM EST until December 18 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 4 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Western Rutland, Eastern Franklin, Eastern Chittenden, Eastern Addison and Eastern Rutland Counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 4 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and isolated power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds are expected to occur between 3 AM and noon on Monday, especially along the western slopes of the Greens.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Eastern Franklin; Eastern Rutland; Western Rutland
